contextId.information: Here Paul includes the Thessalonian believers. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_inclusive]])
Paul includes the Thessalonian believers with his ministry team. (See [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_inclusive]])
contextId.quote: May our God ... our Lord Jesus

contextId.information: Here "we" refers to Paul and his audience. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_inclusive]])
